title: Davey Jones' Closet
description: Avast, maties! Nineteen-year-old Rab was captured when his ship was taken by pirates. But these are no ordinary buccaneers. They dress well, they bathe frequently, and their captain sees to it that the all-male crew is very disciplined. Rab is about to learn more about the ways of men at sea--and himself-- than he ever suspected. A novella by Ellison Ward.:About 21,000 words.
author: Ellison Ward
